1374763194271604738.text: My Balanced Budget Constitutional Amendment will prevent further growth of the national debt by requiring the federal government to do what every American family across the country must do - make sure their spending does not exceed the amount of money they bring in every year.

1374763192900063233.text: The U.S. currently has a debt of over $28 trillion; that’s $84,850 for every American citizen. 1367302685431578625.text: The JUSTICE Act incentivizes trainings to reduce use of force, ends the use of choke holds, and promotes transparency by enhancing the use of body cameras. It’s time America works to support and improve our law enforcement agencies - not defund them.

1367302684550836228.text: I've cosponsored a common-sense alternative to this bill called the JUSTICE Act which implements many of the same provisions while still protecting our law enforcement personnel.

1367302683602862083.text: We are a nation based on the rule of law - defunding our police is not a viable option, and stripping them of their ability to operate is a dangerous path to go down.

1367302682751426560.text: We saw an unprecedented spike in murders in 2020, particularly in places where there were efforts to undermine our law enforcement officers or defund their agencies.

1367302681816166401.text: This bill eliminates qualified immunity which protects law enforcement personnel from frivolous lawsuits unless they violate a person’s rights or break the law. Our police need to know they can take proper & necessary actions w/o fear of being sued for simply doing their jobs.

1367302680956264448.text: THREAD: We all agree that our justice system needs common sense reforms.  Unfortunately the Justice in Policing Act we voted on in the House today would make it nearly impossible for law enforcement officers to do their jobs and keep our communities safe.
